title: 232. Q&AF: Apologizing For Firing People, Progressing Ahead & Overcoming The Biggest Test Day
itunes:title: 232. Q&AF: Apologizing For Firing People, Progressing Ahead & Overcoming The Biggest Test Day
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on if you should apologize for doing the right thing, if there is a correlation between hating yourself & where you're at in your success journey, and what was Andy's biggest test day & how did he manage to overcome it.
